data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 20,121 believers in Dosso, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dosso, Niger
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dosso, Niger so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary: On average, 197 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Dosso, Niger.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Dosso, Niger.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Dosso.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Dendi, Dandawa people.
Spirit, guide seekers in Dosso, Niger to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 20,121 believers living in the state of Dosso. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Dosso to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Dosso
location.people_groups_list: Algerian, Arabic-speaking, Gourma, Zarma, Dendi, Dandawa, Bambara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Algerian, Arabic-speaking (312,000), Gourma (40,000), Zarma (4,393,000), Dendi, Dandawa (132,000), Bambara (50,000)
